fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.interfaces

Interface SimulationManagementCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimulationManagementConnector, SimulationManagementInboundPort, SimulationManagementOutboundPort

    public interface SimulationManagementCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    The component interface SimulationManagementCI declares the methods used by simulation engines to manage simulation runs.

    Description

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant        true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2018-06-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectSupervision(java.lang.String supervisionInboundPortURI)
      connect this simulation engine to the supervisor to be able to notify it the simulation report and passing it the URIs of its inbound ports.
      boolean constructSimulator(java.lang.String modelURI, ComponentModelArchitectureI architecture)
      create the simulator for the receiving component, returning true if the simulator has been correctly constructed, false otherwise.
      void doStandAloneSimulation(double simulationStartTime, double simulationDuration)
      do a stand alone simulation lasting simulatedTimeDuration and starting at startTime.
      void finaliseSimulation()
      finalise the simulation, disposing all resources and reinitialising the models and simulators so that a new simulation run can be undertaken.
      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.simulators.interfaces.SimulationReportI getFinalReport()
      return the simulation report of the last simulation run.
      java.lang.String getModelInboundPortURI()
      return the URI of the model inbound port for this plug-in.
      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time getSimulationEndTime()
      return the time at which the simulation ends.
      java.lang.String getSimulationManagementInboundPortURI()
      return the URI of the simulator management inbound port for this plug-in.
      java.lang.String getSimulatorInboundPortURI()
      return the URI of the simulator inbound port for this plug-in.
      fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.time.Time getTimeOfStart()
      return the time at which the simulation started.
      boolean isSimulationRunning()
      return true if a simulation run is currently executing.
      void reinitialise()
      reinitialise the simulation architectures such that every component participating in the simulation are put back in the state they were before composing the simulation architecture.
      void setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> simParams)
      set the simulation parameters for a simulation run.
      void startRTSimulation(long realTimeOfStart, double simulationStartTime, double simulationDuration)
      at real time realTimeStart, start a real time collaborative simulation with the simulation clock stating at startTime and lasting simulatedTimeDuration.
      void stopSimulation()
      interrupt the current simulation and trigger the sending of the simulation report to the client if appropriately connected.

    • Method Detail

      • constructSimulator

        boolean constructSimulator(java.lang.String modelURI,
                           ComponentModelArchitectureI architecture)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        create the simulator for the receiving component, returning true if the simulator has been correctly constructed, false otherwise.

        Contract

         pre     !isSimulatorSet()
 post    isSimulatorSet()
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model to be held by this component or at the root of the model subtree held by this component.
        architecture - architecture description of the complete simulator.
        Returns:
        true if the simulator has been correctly constructed, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

        void connectSupervision(java.lang.String supervisionInboundPortURI)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        connect this simulation engine to the supervisor to be able to notify it the simulation report and passing it the URIs of its inbound ports.

        Contract

         pre     supervisionInboundPortURI != null && !supervisionInboundPortURI.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        supervisionInboundPortURI - URI of the inbound port of the supervisor.

        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • setSimulationRunParameters

        void setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> simParams)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        set the simulation parameters for a simulation run.

        Description

        This method is the same as fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.interfaces.ModelCI#setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map). It could be factored out in a separate interface, but maybe a too complicated solution for just one method.

        Contract

         pre     simParams != null && simParams.size() > 0
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        simParams - map from parameters names to their values.
        Throws:
        fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.exceptions.MissingRunParameterException - if an expected run parameter does not appear in simParams (including simParams being null).
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        SimulationManagementI.setSimulationRunParameters(java.util.Map)

      • doStandAloneSimulation

        void doStandAloneSimulation(double simulationStartTime,
                            double simulationDuration)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        do a stand alone simulation lasting simulatedTimeDuration and starting at startTime.

        Contract

         pre     simulationStartTime >= 0.0
 pre     simulationStartTime  < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     simulationDuration > 0.0
 pre     simulationDuration < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 post    !isSimulationRunning()
        Parameters:
        simulationStartTime - time at which the simulation starts interpreted in the model simulation time.
        simulationDuration - duration of the simulation interpreted in the model simulation time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        SimulationManagementI.doStandAloneSimulation(double, double)

      • startRTSimulation

        void startRTSimulation(long realTimeOfStart,
                       double simulationStartTime,
                       double simulationDuration)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        at real time realTimeStart, start a real time collaborative simulation with the simulation clock stating at startTime and lasting simulatedTimeDuration.

        Contract

         pre     realTimeStart > System.currentTimeMillis()
 pre     realTimeStart < Long.MAX_VALUE
 pre     simulationStartTime >= 0.0
 pre     simulationStartTime  < Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     simulationDuration > 0
 pre     simulationDuration <= Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY
 pre     isRTSchedulerSet()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        realTimeOfStart - time of start for the simulation, in real time, synchronising all simulation engines.
        simulationStartTime - time at which the simulation starts interpreted in the model simulation time.
        simulationDuration - duration of the simulation interpreted in the model simulation time.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        SimulationManagementI.startRTSimulation(long, double, double)
